title: 1.11怎样检测玩家在指定的方块上
author: xiaoyuan233
txt_content: 例如玩家一站到石头上，就执行命令say 233

replies.author: xiaoyuan233
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-12 14:45
execute @a ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ stone -1 say 233
为啥。。触发一次后再站上去就显示无法执行了？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
xiaoyuan233 发表于 2020-1-12 14:49
为啥。。触发一次后再站上去就显示无法执行了？
高频啊

replies.author: xiaoyuan233
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-12 14:45
execute @a ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ stone -1 say 233
好了！！！
